Name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms V with Power Up Kit
About the game: To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the 'Kou Shibusawa Archives' will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles. In this fifth round of releases, we offer the 1995 release of 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms â…¤ with Power Up Kit.' This version places more focus on the common people with 'Fame,' which was an indicator of how well the Ruler grasped the hearts of the people. Fame influenced all of the Ruler's actions. For the battle phase, players enjoy strategy and the feel of battle in the Three Kingdoms using the formations and special skills assigned to each officer.
